title: When  you win a game you have no business winning in ranked... (poll)
body:
do you feel good? or bad?

I had a game where i had internet issues for levels 3-8 and the enemy lee sin was dunking all over fools, but  my bot lane was dumpstering them... i power farmed then derped around and we won... i feel bad that we won because our adc was on my team and not theirs... but damn, I was useless.... riot gave me an A- though, so that speaks to the quality of the grading system

do you feel good or bad when you probably should have lost, but won anyway?
